column4: hey, is there any way to install the hypercube screensaver? it's usually part of xscreensaver, but it's not in xscreensaver's list
i think theres some glscreensavers in teh package listings you can install
i already installed those, and hypercube doesn't use opengl
it's just lines, no fancy textures or anything
no idea then - i dont mess with screensavers much.
